name: Pong with a Twist
description:
This is a recreation of the classic 'Pong' game meant to be played with two players sharing a keyboard. Just like in the original arcade game, the only controls allow the paddles to be moved. However, unlike classic 'Pong', this game has a bit of a twist to it. First player to reach a score of 15 wins. Good luck.

Player 1 - Use the 'W' and 'S' keys to move up and down

Player 2 - Use the 'Up Arrow' and 'Down Arrow' keys to move up and down
